v_emergency_exit.label: Emergency Exit
v_emergency_exit.description: Powers off the ship (including shields) and makes the user get out of their chair at a normal speed (???)

v_eject.label: Eject
v_eject.description: Emergency eject from your ship's seat, assuming the ship has this feature.

v_view_look_behind.label: Look behind
v_view_look_behind.description: Rear view camera for your vehicle

v_toggle_mining_mode.label: Mining Mode Toggle
v_toggle_mining_mode.description: Toggle mining mode in your vehicle.

v_toggle_salvage_mode.label: Salvage Mode Toggle
v_toggle_salvage_mode.description: Toggle salvage mode in your vehicle.

v_toggle_scan_mode.label: Scan Mode Toggle
v_toggle_scan_mode.description: Toggle scan mode in your vehicle.

v_toggle_missile_mode.label: Missile Mode Toggle
v_toggle_missile_mode.description: Toggle missile mode in your vehicle

v_toggle_guns_mode.label: Guns Mode Toggle
v_toggle_guns_mode.description: Toggle guns mode in your vehicle

v_toggle_flight_mode.label: Flight Mode Toggle
v_toggle_flight_mode.description: Toggle flight mode in your vehicle

v_set_mining_mode.label: Mining Mode On
v_set_mining_mode.description: Set your ship to mining mode

v_set_salvage_mode.label: Salvage Mode On
v_set_salvage_mode.description: Set your ship to salvage mode

v_set_scan_mode.label: Scan Mode On
v_set_scan_mode.description: Set your ship to scan mode

v_set_quantum_mode.label: Quantum Mode On
v_set_quantum_mode.description: Set your ship to quantum/nav mode

v_set_missile_mode.label: Missile Mode On
v_set_missile_mode.description: Set your ship to missile mode

v_set_guns_mode.label: Guns Mode On
v_set_guns_mode.description: Set your ship to guns mode

v_set_flight_mode.label: Flight Mode On
v_set_flight_mode.description: Set your ship to flight mode

v_enter_remote_turret_1.label: Enter Remote Turret (1)
v_enter_remote_turret_1.description: While operating an appropriate station/seat, take control of the ship's first remote turret without needing to cycle through them.

v_enter_remote_turret_2.label: Enter Remote Turret (2)
v_enter_remote_turret_2.description: While operating an appropriate station/seat, take control of the ship's second remote turret without needing to cycle through them.

v_enter_remote_turret_3.label: Enter Remote Turret (3)
v_enter_remote_turret_3.description: While operating an appropriate station/seat, take control of the ship's third remote turret without needing to cycle through them.

turret_remote_cycle_next.label: Cycle Next Remote Turret
turret_remote_cycle_next.description: Take control of the next remote turret that can be controlled from your seat/station.

turret_remote_cycle_prev.label: Cycle Prev Remote Turret
turret_remote_cycle_prev.description: Take control of the previous remote turret that can be controlled from your seat/station.

turret_gyromode.label: Turret - Gyromode Toggle
turret_gyromode.description: Toggle whether the turret aim is independent or affect by the roll/pitch/yaw of the ship itself.

turret_toggle_mouse_mode.label: Turret - Mouse Movement Type - Toggle
turret_toggle_mouse_mode.description: Switch between 'vjoy' mouse aim and an FPS style aim.

turret_mouse_mode_cycle.label: Turret - Mouse Movement Type - Cycle
turret_mouse_mode_cycle.description: Similar to 'Turret Mouse Movement Toggle' but cycles between more modes

turret_mouse_mode_set_vjoy.label: Turret - Mouse Movement Type - Set Vjoy
turret_mouse_mode_set_vjoy.description: Set the current mouse mode to virtual joystick.

turret_mouse_mode_set_1to1.label: Turret - Mouse Movement Type - Set Absolute
turret_mouse_mode_set_1to1.description: Set the current mouse movement mode to FPS style aim.

turret_mouse_mode_set_pointer.label: Turret - Mouse Movement Type - Set Pointer
turret_mouse_mode_set_pointer.description: Set the current mouse movement mode to the pointer style.

turret_esp_toggle.label: Turret - ESP Toggle
turret_esp_toggle.description: Enhanced Stick Precision, also known as ESP, dulls the sensitivity curves of the player input on the fly when the crosshair is near the target in order to minimize overshooting and help stay on target. It is similar to aim assist and is primarily intended for joystick users.  There is an invisible circle around the player crosshair. When the pip enters the circle, the joystick input is dampened on a curve. This softens jerky or excessive stick movement common for a lot of people when trying to stay aimed at the pip during hard maneuvering at an evasive target. (https://starcitizen.tools/ESP)

turret_esp_hold.label: Turret - ESP While Held
turret_esp_hold.description: Enhanced Stick Precision, also known as ESP, dulls the sensitivity curves of the player input on the fly when the crosshair is near the target in order to minimize overshooting and help stay on target. It is similar to aim assist and is primarily intended for joystick users.  There is an invisible circle around the player crosshair. When the pip enters the circle, the joystick input is dampened on a curve. This softens jerky or excessive stick movement common for a lot of people when trying to stay aimed at the pip during hard maneuvering at an evasive target. (https://starcitizen.tools/ESP)

turret_recenter.label: Recenter Turret
turret_recenter.description: Automatically reorients the turret to face its default position relative to the ship while held.

turret_limiter_toggle.label: Turret - Speed Limiter On/off
turret_limiter_toggle.description: This is a 'smart toggle' by default, meaning you can hold/release to temporarily toggle, or tap to permanently toggle.  Turns the turret pitch/yaw speed limiter on or off.

turret_limiter_abs.label: Turret - Speed Limit Increase/Decrease (abs)
turret_limiter_abs.description: This should be set to a slider or similar control

turret_change_position.label: Change Turret Position
turret_change_position.description: For turrets that have two or more possible positions.  Such as the tractor turret on the Crusader C1 Spirit`

v_self_destruct.description: Destroy your ship from the pilot seat; timer depends on the ship (bigger ships allow more time for evacuation).

v_flightready.label: Flight/Systems Ready
v_flightready.description: Turn on power, engines, and shields with a single action.

v_toggle_all_doors.label: Open/Close All Doors
v_toggle_all_doors.description: Toggle whether the ship's doors/elevators/ramps are all open or closed. Depending on how CIG have setup the ship, this will often include all the component bays and interior doors.

v_open_all_doors.description: Open all doors/elevators/ramps on your ship. Depending on how CIG have setup the ship, this will often include all the component bays and interior doors.

v_close_all_doors.description: Close all doors/elevators/ramps on your ship. Depending on how CIG have setup the ship, this will often include all the component bays and interior doors.

v_toggle_all_doorlocks.label: Lock/Unlock All Doors
v_toggle_all_doorlocks.description: Toggle whether the doors/elevators/ramps on your ship are locked or unlocked.  Locked doors can only be opened by the ship owner and their party members.  Unlocked doors can be opened by anyone.

v_lock_all_doors.description: Lock all doors/elevators/ramps on your ship.  Locked doors can only be opened by the ship owner and their party members.  Unlocked doors can be opened by anyone.

v_unlock_all_doors.description: Unlock all doors/elevators/ramps on your ship.  Locked doors can only be opened by the ship owner and their party members.  Unlocked doors can be opened by anyone.

v_toggle_all_portlocks.label: Lock/Unlock All Ports
v_toggle_all_portlocks.description: Toggle whether the lock state of the ship's ports - Ports must be UNLOCKED in order to remove/replace components, weapoons, or utilities with a tractor beam tool.

v_lock_all_ports.description: Lock all of the ship's ports - Ports must be UNLOCKED in order to remove/replace components, weapoons, or utilities with a tractor beam tool.

v_unlock_all_ports.description: Unlock all of the ship's ports - Ports must be UNLOCKED in order to remove/replace components, weapoons, or utilities with a tractor beam tool.

v_mfd_select_view_self_status_short.label: MFD - Set Page - Self Status (Short Press)

v_mfd_select_view_self_status_long.label: MFD - Set Page - Self Status (Long Press)

v_mfd_select_view_target_status_short.label: MFD - Set Page - Target Status (Short Press)

v_mfd_select_view_target_status_long.label: MFD - Set Page - Target Status (Long Press)

v_mfd_select_view_configuration_short.label: MFD - Set Page - Vehicle Configuration (Short Press)

v_mfd_select_view_configuration_long.label: MFD - Set Page - Vehicle Configuration (Long Press)

v_mfd_select_view_resource_network_short.label: MFD - Set Page - Resource Network (Short Press)

v_mfd_select_view_resource_network_long.label: MFD - Set Page - Resource Network (Long Press)

v_ads_hold.label: Vehicle ADS (Hold)
v_ads_hold.description: On foot, CIG call this 'zoom', but in a ship they call it 'ADS'.  This is the 'zoom while in a ship' mode.

v_ads_toggle.label: Vehicle ADS (Toggle)
v_ads_toggle.description: On foot, CIG call this 'zoom', but in a ship they call it 'ADS'.  This is the 'zoom while in a ship' mode.

v_toggle_relative_mouse_mode.label: Cycle mouse mode (VJoy / Relative)
v_toggle_relative_mouse_mode.description: Switches the mouse behavior for ship rotations between a relative (FPS style) and a Vjoy mode.

v_strafe_longitudinal_invert.label: Throttle - Forward / Back Invert
v_strafe_longitudinal_invert.description: Inverts Strafe Longitudinal Absolute Axis Half (Neutral - Backward)

v_ifcs_vector_decoupling_toggle.label: Decoupled Mode Toggle
v_ifcs_vector_decoupling_toggle.description: Decoupled Off: The ship will automatically counter-thrust based on your vector to feel as though you're flying in atmosphere.  Decoupled On: Newtonian(ish) physics are applied withtout counter thrust.

v_ifcs_vector_decoupling_on.label: Decoupled Mode On
v_ifcs_vector_decoupling_on.description: Decoupled Off: The ship will automatically counter-thrust based on your vector to feel as though you're flying in atmosphere.  Decoupled On: Newtonian(ish) physics are applied withtout counter thrust.

v_ifcs_vector_decoupling_off.label: Decoupled Mode Off
v_ifcs_vector_decoupling_off.description: Decoupled Off: The ship will automatically counter-thrust based on your vector to feel as though you're flying in atmosphere.  Decoupled On: Newtonian(ish) physics are applied withtout counter thrust.

v_space_brake.label: Spacebrake
v_space_brake.description: Reverse thrust on all velocity vectors

v_lock_rotation.label: Lock Pitch / Yaw Movement (Toggle / Hold)
v_lock_rotation.description: While active no rotational inputs are allowed to your ship. This is useful for arresting movement when you lost control using a mouse.

v_ifcs_gsafe_on.label: G-Force safety on
v_ifcs_gsafe_on.description: When on, this will limit your thrust along certain vectors, when necessary, in order to prevent the pilot from passing out from the G-forces.

v_ifcs_gsafe_off.label: G-Force safety off
v_ifcs_gsafe_off.description: When on, this will limit your thrust along certain vectors, when necessary, in order to prevent the pilot from passing out from the G-forces.

v_ifcs_toggle_gforce_safety.label: G-Force Safety On/Off (Toggle / Hold)
v_ifcs_toggle_gforce_safety.description: When on, this will limit your thrust along certain vectors, when necessary, in order to prevent the pilot from passing out from the G-forces.

v_ifcs_toggle_esp.label: ESP - Toggle On / Off (Press)
v_ifcs_toggle_esp.description: Enhanced Stick Precision, also known as ESP, dulls the sensitivity curves of the player input on the fly when the crosshair is near the target in order to minimize overshooting and help stay on target. It is similar to aim assist and is primarily intended for joystick users.  There is an invisible circle around the player crosshair. When the pip enters the circle, the joystick input is dampened on a curve. This softens jerky or excessive stick movement common for a lot of people when trying to stay aimed at the pip during hard maneuvering at an evasive target. (https://starcitizen.tools/ESP)

v_ifcs_esp_hold.label: ESP - Enable Temporarily (Hold)
v_ifcs_esp_hold.description: Enhanced Stick Precision, also known as ESP, dulls the sensitivity curves of the player input on the fly when the crosshair is near the target in order to minimize overshooting and help stay on target. It is similar to aim assist and is primarily intended for joystick users.  There is an invisible circle around the player crosshair. When the pip enters the circle, the joystick input is dampened on a curve. This softens jerky or excessive stick movement common for a lot of people when trying to stay aimed at the pip during hard maneuvering at an evasive target. (https://starcitizen.tools/ESP)

v_vtol_toggle.label: VTOL Toggle
v_vtol_toggle.description: Ships with VTOL mode will shift thrust or rotate entire thrusters to increase vertical thrust flight mode.  VTOL = Vertical Take Off and Landing

v_vtol_on.label: VTOL On
v_vtol_on.description: Ships with VTOL mode will shift thrust or rotate entire thrusters to increase vertical thrust flight mode.  VTOL = Vertical Take Off and Landing

v_vtol_off.label: VTOL Off
v_vtol_off.description: Ships with VTOL mode will shift thrust or rotate entire thrusters to increase vertical thrust flight mode.  VTOL = Vertical Take Off and Landing

v_transform_cycle.label: Cycle Configuration
v_transform_cycle.description: Cycle between the vehicle's expanded and retracted configurations.

v_autoland.label: Autoland
v_autoland.description: Activate Autoland - Automatically land when landing gear is out and you're close to a landable pad.

v_atc_request.label: Request Landing
v_atc_request.description: Contacts Air Traffic Control and other landing services to open/close hangar doors etc.

v_atc_loading_area_request.label: Request Cargo Loading
v_atc_loading_area_request.description: Request landing access for cargo haulers

v_ifcs_reset_gmeter_max.label: Reset Flight Accelerometer
v_ifcs_reset_gmeter_max.description: Resets the max endured Gs for the accelerometer.

v_look_ahead_enable.label: Look Ahead Toggle
v_look_ahead_enable.description: Toggle whether the pilot's view automatically looks toward the forward vector/horizon (intensity and type will depend on your Game Settings)

v_look_ahead_start_target_tracking.label: Target Padlock Toggle (Hold)
v_look_ahead_start_target_tracking.description: The name of this bind in the XML is 'look ahead start target tracking' - This probably toggles whether your Look Ahead mode will look towards the current target.

v_target_tracking_auto_zoom.label: Auto Zoom on selected target toggle (hold)
v_target_tracking_auto_zoom.description: Toggle whether your view zooms when a target is selected.

v_target_under_reticle.label: Lock target under reticle
v_target_under_reticle.description: Have your ship's computer lock onto the ship you're aiming at (not missles, just computer tracking).  The locked target will hear a sound alerting them to your lock.

v_target_cycle_in_view_reset.label: Cycle Lock - In View - Under Reticle
v_target_cycle_in_view_reset.description: 'Cycle Lock - In View - Reset to First'  may also be another name for this.  Perhaps it cycles between ships under reticle?

v_target_cycle_pinned_reset.label: Cycle Lock - Pinned - Reset to First

v_target_cycle_hostile_reset.label: Cycle Lock - Hostiles - Closest
v_target_cycle_hostile_reset.description: Lock onto the closest hostile vehicle.

v_target_cycle_friendly_back.label: Cycle Lock - Friendlies - Back
v_target_cycle_friendly_back.description: Cycle through non-hostile targets in the area.

v_target_cycle_friendly_fwd.label: Cycle Lock - Friendlies - Forward
v_target_cycle_friendly_fwd.description: Cycle through non-hostile targets in the area.

v_target_cycle_friendly_reset.label: Cycle Lock - Friendlies - Closest
v_target_cycle_friendly_reset.description: Lock onto the closest friendly vehicle.

v_target_cycle_all_back.label: Cycle Lock - All - Back
v_target_cycle_all_back.description: Cycle through all vehicles in range of your scanners.

v_target_cycle_all_fwd.label: Cycle Lock - All - Forward
v_target_cycle_all_fwd.description: Cycle through all vehicles in range of your scanners.

v_target_cycle_all_reset.label: Cycle Lock - All - Closest
v_target_cycle_all_reset.description: Lock onto the closest vehicle to you.

v_target_cycle_subitem_back.label: Cycle Lock - Sub-Target - Back
v_target_cycle_subitem_back.description: Cycle through the current locked-on target's sub-targets to focus fire on them (e.g. turrets, thrusters)

v_target_cycle_subitem_fwd.label: Cycle Lock - Sub-Target - Forward
v_target_cycle_subitem_fwd.description: Cycle through the current locked-on target's sub-targets to focus fire on them (e.g. turrets, thrusters)

v_target_cycle_subitem_reset.label: Cycle Lock - Sub-Target - Reset
v_target_cycle_subitem_reset.description: Reset your sub-targeting to the main target.

v_target_hail.label: Hail Target
v_target_hail.description: Initiate an in-game video call to the vehicle currently locked on to.

v_scanning_trigger_scan.label: Activate Scanning
v_scanning_trigger_scan.description: Scans the target under your reticle while held.

v_mining_use_permanent_modifier.label: Activate Mining Module - Permanent Modifier
v_mining_use_permanent_modifier.description: Currently in SC this is labelled as a duplicate of activate slot 1, so it's been named here according to its XML name: 'use permanent modifier'

v_jettison_volatile_cargo.label: Jettison Volatile Cargo
v_jettison_volatile_cargo.description: If you have volatile mining cargo, such as Quantanium, and it's about to explode, this action will let you jettison your entire cargo to save you and the ship.

v_salvage_toggle_fire_focused.label: Fire Focused Salvage Beams - Toggle
v_salvage_toggle_fire_focused.description: Other controls can set focus to specific beams, this action will then toggle the focussed beam(s) on or off.

v_salvage_toggle_fire_left.label: Fire Left Salvage Beam
v_salvage_toggle_fire_left.description: Toggle fire the left salvage beam, regardless of focus

v_salvage_toggle_fire_right.label: Fire Right Salvage Beam
v_salvage_toggle_fire_right.description: Toggle fire the right salvage beam, regardless of focus

v_salvage_increase_beam_spacing.label: Salvage Beam Spacing Increase
v_salvage_increase_beam_spacing.description: Make the gap between beams bigger.

v_salvage_decrease_beam_spacing.label: Salvage Beam Spacing Decrease
v_salvage_decrease_beam_spacing.description: Bring the beams closer to the central point.

v_salvage_toggle_beam_spacing_axis.label: Salvage Beam Axis - Toggle
v_salvage_toggle_beam_spacing_axis.description: Toggles between the two salvage beams being parallel horizontal and being parallel vertical.

v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_focused.label: Cycle Focused Salvage Modifiers
v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_focused.description: Cycle the mode/modifiers for any salvage beam(s) that have focus (e.g. between different scraper models, and/or a tractor beam).

v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_left.label: Cylce Left Salvage Modifiers
v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_left.description: Cycle the mode/modifiers for the left salvage beam only, regardless of focus.

v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_right.label: Cylce Right Salvage Modifiers
v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_right.description: Cycle the mode/modifiers for the right salvage beam only, regardless of focus.

v_salvage_focus_all_heads.label: Focus all salvage heads
v_salvage_focus_all_heads.description: Set focus to all of your salvage head. Controls that rely on focus will now affect all your salvage heads.

v_salvage_focus_left.label: Focus Left Salvage Head
v_salvage_focus_left.description: Set focus to your left salvage head. Controls that rely on focus will now affect only your left salvage head.

v_salvage_focus_right.label: Focus Right Salvage Head
v_salvage_focus_right.description: Set focus to your right salvage head. Controls that rely on focus will now affect only your right salvage head.

v_salvage_focus_fracture.label: Focus Fracture Tool
v_salvage_focus_fracture.description: Set focus to the Fracture Tool.

v_salvage_focus_disintegrate.label: Focus Disintegration Tool
v_salvage_focus_disintegrate.description: Set focus to the Disintegration Tool.

v_salvage_nudge_up__left.label: Nudge Left Salvage Tool: Up
v_salvage_nudge_up__left.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_salvage_nudge_down__left.label: Nudge Left Salvage Tool: Down
v_salvage_nudge_down__left.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_salvage_nudge_left__left.label: Nudge Left Salvage Tool: Left
v_salvage_nudge_left__left.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_salvage_nudge_right__left.label: Nudge Left Salvage Tool: Right
v_salvage_nudge_right__left.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_salvage_nudge_up__right.label: Nudge Right Salvage Tool: Up
v_salvage_nudge_up__right.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_salvage_nudge_down__right.label: Nudge Right Salvage Tool: Down
v_salvage_nudge_down__right.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_salvage_nudge_left__right.label: Nudge Right Salvage Tool: Left
v_salvage_nudge_left__right.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_salvage_nudge_right__right.label: Nudge Right Salvage Tool: Right
v_salvage_nudge_right__right.description: Nudges the aim of the salvage beam a little bit in the stated direction.

v_weapon_staggered_fire_toggle.label: Staggered Fire Toggle
v_weapon_staggered_fire_toggle.description: In staggered fire mode, your guns will fire one after the other instead of at the same time.

v_weapon_staggered_fire_on.label: Staggered Fire On
v_weapon_staggered_fire_on.description: In staggered fire mode, your guns will fire one after the other instead of at the same time.

v_weapon_staggered_fire_off.label: Staggered Fire Off
v_weapon_staggered_fire_off.description: In normal fire mode, your guns will fire at the same time.

v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_single.label: PIP Combination Type Set One PIP per weapon

v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_combin.label: PIP Combination Type Set One PIP per weapon type

v_weapon_convergence_distance_rel.label: Manual Convergence Distance (rel.)
v_weapon_convergence_distance_rel.description: Set the distance at which your weapons naturally converge to a single focal point.

v_weapon_convergence_distance_abs.label: Manual Convergence Distance (abs.)
v_weapon_convergence_distance_abs.description: This kind of action (absolute) is best set to something like a slider

v_weapon_preset_qid_jammer.label: Weapon Preset - Set Quantum Jammers (short range)

v_weapon_preset_qid_pulse.label: Weapon Preset - Set Quantum Snares/Pulse (long range)

v_weapon_preset_qid.label: Weapon Preset - Set QIDs
v_weapon_preset_qid.description: QID = Quantum Interdiction Device.  Prevents the Quantum Drive from functioning in ships within the area of effect, which prevents jumping and limits speed to SCM speeds.

v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_launch.label: Decoy - Launch Burst (tap), Set and Launch Burst (hold)

v_engineering_assignment_engine_max.label: Power Allocation - Engines - Set To Max (Hold)

v_engineering_assignment_engine_min.label: Power Allocation - Engines - Set To Min (Hold)

v_engineering_assignment_shields_max.label: Power Allocation - Shields - Set to Max (Hold)

v_engineering_assignment_shields_min.label: Power Allocation - Shields - Set to Min (Hold)

v_engineering_assignment_weapons_max.label: Power Allocation - Weapons - Set to Max (Hold)

v_engineering_assignment_weapons_min.label: Power Allocation - Weapons - Set to Min (Hold)

v_cycle_pitch_ladder_mode.description: Used to show/hide the ladder in your HUD that indicates your angle relative to the horizon.   Now seems to do nothing as the ladder is just always on by default.  Also does not seem to be bindable in game, and even when bound via Star Binder it doesn't appear to do anything.

visor_wipe.label: Wipe Helmet Visor
visor_wipe.description: Wipe away anything covering your view on your helmet. Can be used while flying or on foot.

throw_overhand.label: Throw - Overarm & Two-Handed
throw_overhand.description: A stronger throw of the item in your hand (incl. grenades)

throw_underhand.label: Throw - Underarm
throw_underhand.description: A weaker throw for short range lobs of the item in your hand (incl. grenades)

zoom.label: ADS (Aim Down Sight)
zoom.description: This is the ADS action for sights

interact_with_scope.label: Interact with Scope
interact_with_scope.description: Will toggle active ability like night vision on compatible scopes and sights

toggle_lowered.label: Weapon Stance / Lower Weapon - Toggle
toggle_lowered.description: Lower your weapon to appear less aggressive but keep it held and ready.

customize.label: Customize Weapon
customize.description: Diegetic UI to add/remove attachments to your held weapon based on what you have on your person.

downedRevivalRequest.label: Request Medical Rescue (while incapacitated)
downedRevivalRequest.description: Send up a beacon to request medical rescue.

toggleHelmetState.label: Toggle Helmet State
toggleHelmetState.description: This is mixed up in the in-game keybind UI because of a bug/error in the gamefiles (it's given the same UI name as increase walk speed by mistake).  It's not clear what this action does, if anything.  It may depend on the helmet (perhaps there are helmets with retractable visors or something).

ship_recall.label: Recall Last Vehicle
ship_recall.description: Is this just for Arena Commander?

dismiss_corpse_marker.label: Dismiss Corpse Marker
dismiss_corpse_marker.description: Remove the marker for your corpse from your HUD.

consume.label: Eat/Drink
consume.description: Consume the food item held in your hand.

force_respawn.label: Force Re-spawn (E.V.A. / On Foot)
force_respawn.description: Perish and respawn at the relevant location

tractor_beam_increase_distance.label: Tractor Beam - Increase Distance
tractor_beam_increase_distance.description: Increases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

tractor_beam_decrease_distance.label: Tractor Beam - Decrease Distance
tractor_beam_decrease_distance.description: Decreases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

weapon_change_mining_throttle.label: Hand Mining Throttle - Increase/Decrease
weapon_change_mining_throttle.description: Adjust the power output of the hand tool while mining

incapacitatedRespawn.label: Regen (while Incapacitated)
incapacitatedRespawn.description: Perish and respawn at the relevant location

v_boost.label: Boost
v_boost.description: Make a ground vehicle go faster while driving it.

respawn.label: Re-spawn
respawn.description: This has the 'social general' tag because that's what CIG put it as.  This is the AC respawn command or is perhaps redundant.

toggle_contact.label: CommLink App (Toggle)
toggle_contact.description: Opens the global chat in MobiGlas

cycle_chat_lobby.label: Cycle Chat Lobby
cycle_chat_lobby.description: Press to cycle through subscribed lobbies in chat.

focus_on_chat_textinput.label: Chat Window On/Off
focus_on_chat_textinput.description: Show/Hide the chat window on your HUD.

emote_launch.label: Emote: Confirm Launch
emote_launch.description: Confirms the launch of the vehicle

headtrack_hold.label: Head Tracking (Hold)
headtrack_hold.description: Enables head tracking as long as the button is held down
